betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The Meta-Dynamic Cannon needs to be energized on the §5 Meta-Dynamic Base§r, and cannot draw energy directly from the rift. 

When fully energized, it will fire a powerful beam cannon that deals 1 point of magic damage per frame to the enemy, very scary, it can also install two upgrades. 

 Orbital Cannon Component: After installing this upgrade, the cannon's attack changes to immediately firing a beam of energy that deals 30 points of damage with a range of 64 frames, accompanied by a penetration effect that damages enemies in a line. It enters a cooldown of up to 5 seconds after use. 

Burst Mode Component: With this upgrade installed, the cannon attacks by rapidly firing 3 beams of energy that do 8 points of damage (however, due to the weak recoil, each of the three beams will actually be a fraction higher than the previous one), has a range of 33 frames, and requires a cooldown time of 1.5 s before it can fire again after an attack. 

 All components are synthesized at the Workbench with the Cannon in an unordered fashion for upgrades.
